text: Hey people I m  M with bipolar I and schizoid personality disorder  among a handful of other issues I feel empty and passionless  I do not love anyone  or anything  I feel next to nothing  I am nothing  There s nothing tying me to reality  I feel like a void  an absence  like anything other than human  And there s very little hope  due to the nature of my disorder  that this will ever change I ve been dealing with suicidal thoughts for a while now  but in the past half a year it s been way too much  Currently I m hospitalized  voluntarily  for the second time in the past three months  but I m beginning to regret this decision  If I weren t here  in the hospital  I d kill myself today I can t imagine myself living on  Having a job to sustain myself  forcing myself to be creative just for the sake of filling the void that can t be filled  hanging out with the occasional acquiantance  all aimlessly  all devoid of meaning or purpose  and for what  Just to die anyway a little later I feel like all my issues are culminating into a tight point  My whole life I m just drifting in and out of crises  never at peace  never comfortable  all for continuing an existence that s about as vibrant and full of taste as a piece of stale bread   I ve made peace with death  I ve made a plan  I ve written a note  one of several I m planning to write to different people before I go As soon as I m out of the hospital  I m finally ending it  I ve had my go at life  it was eh  and there s no point in pushing further I don t want to live anymore
summary: As soon as he's out of the hospital, he's going to kill himself. He's bipolar, schizoid personality disorder and has a lot of other issues. He doesn't want to live anymore. He has written a note one of several he plans to write to different people before he goes.
cleaned: soon hospital go kill bipolar schizoid personality disorder lot issue not want live anymore write note plan write different people go

text: I posted about a week ago saying that I was gonna do itAnd I didn t  clearly I was sitting by the edge of the train tracks  and I figured the right moment would come   One train passed  and then another  And then another And then it started to rain  It was a very light  soft rain  It was warm  summer rain  As cliche as it is  it felt like the world felt my pain  It felt warm and beautiful and I couldn t go through with it I sat for a little while longer before walking home in the rain  When I got home  I couldn t answer anyone about where I d been  I went to my room and laid down and cried for the first time in a very long time I don t feel peace like I felt that day  I don t feel resolve  I don t feel better and I m still not sure I did the right thing walking away But I got an overwhelming response on my posts  You were all so kind and so warm  There was so much understanding and a desire to help  I won t lie and say it s what stopped me  but it s definitely been helping me since that day I just wanted to say thank you for making my world a little warmer  and I wanted to let anyone who saw my post know that I m still here  Life is a fucking bitch and dear god I hate her  but I m still here Thanks
summary: A week ago I was going to kill myself. It started to rain and I couldn't go through with it, so I walked home in the rain. When I got home, I went to my room and cried for the first time in a long time. I got an overwhelming response on my posts.
cleaned: week ago go kill start rain not walk home rain get home go room cry time long time get overwhelming response post
